title: 10 Tips For Growing Your Small Business
summary: The first thing to do when growing your small business is to have a clear vision of what you want your company to look like in the future. You need to make sure that you are effectively marketing your products and/or services to your target audience. Be transparent with your employees and make sure you are using your company name, logo, and other identifying features consistently across your marketing materials and website. Establishing brand awareness is all about letting people know who you are, what you do, and what you have to offer.
